name: Vidhi Abrasives
description: manufacturer and supplier of Abrasive Po
overview:
Established in year 2004, we, “Vidhi Abrasives Products”, are among the prestigious organizations engaged in manufacturing and supplying Abrasive Powder, Abrasive Grain, Aluminum Oxide, Calcined Bauxite, Chalk Powder and Mining Mineral. These products are processed under the guidance of our experienced professionals, who strictly follow the norms and standards already laid by the industry.

Infrastructure: Loaded with advanced machines & technologies, our organization has constructed a sophisticated infrastructure facility. Spread over a vast area, this facility enables us in conducting all our trade tasks in a proper manner and at a single place.

Our Team: Experienced professionals Quality experts Sales and marketing executives Administrators

Quality Assurance: We are committed to offer qualitative products to the clients and so for the reason strictly follow industry laid norms and standards. Along with this, our professionals employ advanced machines and use of optimum quality material while processing these products.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client-centric organization, we strive hard to enhance the satisfaction level of our customers. So for the reason, we ensure to process our products in accordance with industry standards and offer them at market leading prices to the customers. Also, to fulfill the divergent requirements of the customers, we offer these products in various specifications as well as in customized range.
